name: Singularity (itch) (jinshengggg)
description:
Singularity is a Sci-Fi Click and Move Survival game, made with Unity. You play as a lone android fighting against rogue android and Titans, while powering up friendly bots to aid you. Your android also comes with a Nova Gas skill to blow up you enemies. 

This is my first game project ever made, and it was a fun and challenging journey. Support me on my Instagram page @jinshengsart, or donate to me through itch.io!! 

Thank you all!!
